Title: D-Day
Writer: Nikkhil Advani, Ritesh Shah, Suresh Nair, Niranjan Iyengar, Nikkhil Advani (screenplay), Ritesh Shah (dialogue)
Actors: Rishi Kapoor, Irrfan Khan, Arjun Rampal, Shruti Haasan
Plot: A team of experts dispatched to bring in The Most Wanted Man in India almost achieves the unthinkable ... until something goes horribly wrong.
